articles.title: Matt Damon explains to Joe Rogan why Netflix now makes movies for people with zero attention span
articles.description:
is used to specify article abstract. You can only provide plain text in this element. --> Matt Damon told Joe Rogan that Netflix executives ask screenwriters to create excitement in "the first five minutes" of a movie and to have characters reiterate the plot "three or four times" for people looking at their phones.
